mapper.select: SELECT team_member_seq , user_nickname , user_phone , user_email , user_birth_date , user_gender , user_github_id FROM tbl_team_member tm JOIN tbl_team t ON t.team_seq = tm.team_seq JOIN tbl_user u ON u.user_seq = tm.user_seq WHERE tm.team_seq = #{teamSeq} AND user_status = 'ACTIVE'

SELECT team_schedule_seq , team_schedule_content , DATE_FORMAT(team_schedule_start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') team_schedule_start_date , DATE_FORMAT(team_schedule_end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') team_schedule_end_date FROM tbl_team_schedule ts JOIN tbl_team t ON t.team_seq = ts.team_seq WHERE t.team_seq = #{teamSeq}
SELECT team_seq , team_name FROM tbl_team t JOIN tbl_project p ON t.project_seq = p.project_seq WHERE team_seq = #{teamSeq}
